title: Oscars 2019: Here's The Complete List Of Winners At The 91st Academy Awards
text:
Oscars 2019: Here's The Complete List Of Winners At The 91st Academy Awards
Oscars 2019: Here's The Complete List Of Winners At The 91st Academy Awards
Oscars are the most coveted award shows across the globe. Whether it's foreign language films, animated cinema or short films, this is one such platform that recognises talent from all corners. And this year was no different.
From fresh talent to legendary artists, 2019 Academy Awards had an interesting line up of winners. The show which was held in Dolby Theatre, was a unique one in a lot of ways, This was a first show that had no host.
From Queen's electrifying performance to Lady Gaga-Bradley Cooper's Shallow performance, Oscars was mesmerising like always.
The list of winners too pleasantly surprised the audience. While Green Book took home the Best Picture award, Rami Malek whisked away the Best Actor award for Bohemian Rhapsody. An India based film Period too made its way into Oscars in the short Documentary movie category and emerged victorious.
Here's taking a look at the complete winners list from Oscars 2019.
Best Picture: "Green Book"
Best Director: Alfonso Cuaron for "Roma"
Best Actress: Olivia Colman for "The Favourite"
Olivia Colman is blown away as she accepts her Best Actress Award for her performance in @the_favourite. #Oscars pic.twitter.com/4oQAUUv19Y — The Academy (@TheAcademy) February 25, 2019
Best Actor: Rami Malek for "Bohemian Rhapsody"
Best Supporting Actress: Regina King for "If Beale Street Could Talk"
Don't Miss 51.2 K SHARES 807 SHARES 4.3 K SHARES 310 SHARES 3.7 K SHARES
Best Supporting Actor: Mahershala Ali for "Green Book"
Best Foreign Language Film: "Roma" (Mexico)
Best Animated Feature Film: "Spider-Man: Into The Spider-Verse"
Best Original Screenplay: "Green Book"
Best Adapted Screenplay: "BlacKkKlansman"
Best Original Score: "Black Panther"
Best Original Song: "Shallow" from "A Star Is Born"
Best Documentary Feature: "Free Solo"
Look who stopped by the #Oscars Thank You Cam, presented by @Cadillac! Best Documentary Short winners for Period. End of Sentence. #KeepRising pic.twitter.com/NssJfSPkI3 — The Academy (@TheAcademy) February 25, 2019
Best Documentary Short: "Period.
